title: Stock Market Simulator Game
description:
This is the only app you need to learn how to invest quickly. If you're investing already or wanting to be a better trader then you need to practice trading technically with a chart.

This app let's you practice your trading in real time! You can instantly skip to the next trading day. No need to wait! There's a button you can press to move the chart forward 1 day, 1 week, 1 month or 3 months.
